bug.author: siqinli
bug.summary: VIdeo and Image inputs are not able to run the demo on Ubuntu
bug.description:
when I run the demo command ./build/examples/openpose/openpose.bin --video examples/media/video.avi it came out the error: Coming from:
src/openpose/utilities/flagsToOpenPose.cpp:flagsToProducerType():73 src/openpose/utilities/flagsToOpenPose.cpp:flagsToProducerType():85 src/openpose/utilities/flagsToOpenPose.cpp:flagsToProducer():133 terminate called after throwing an instance of 'std::runtime_error' what(): Error: Selected simultaneously video and webcam. Please, select only one.'
Running on image has the same problem

comments.comment: I fixed it a few minutes after I introduced the bug, unfortunately you downloaded it in that moment. Please download the last version. Thanks!
